entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
